entry.question: Does Sonic Stun Gun's effect count for itself?
entry.answer: No, Sonic Stun-Gun doesn't see itself being played.

entry.question: What does "being upgraded" mean on Gearsâ€™s stratagem Sabotage?
entry.answer: Being upgraded covers any time an upgrade is Put on a character (including Playing, Moving, and Swapping). It does not cover when an upgrade remains on a character during combining.
